definition: A term commonly employed to refer to the initial stage or beginning of something, often used to describe the starting point of a process, event, or period. It is frequently utilized in contexts related to time, narratives, or sequences.

examples.english: In the beginning was the Word.

examples.german: Es ist schwer, einen Anfang zu machen.
examples.english: It is difficult to make a start.
In the beginning, everything was easy.
